translations.chinese: 故秦苑囿園池，令民得田之。
translations.english: The former Qin parks, gardens, and ponds were opened so the people could farm them.

translations.chinese: 三月，漢王自臨晉渡河，魏王豹降，將兵從。
translations.english: In the third month, King Han crossed the Yellow River from Linjin. King Wei Bao surrendered and led troops to follow him.

translations.chinese: 下河內，虜殷王卬，置河內郡。
translations.english: He took Henan and captured King Yin Ang, establishing Henan commandery.
He reached Xiuwu. Chen Ping deserted Chu and came to surrender.

translations.chinese: 漢 王與語，說之，使參乘，監諸將。
translations.english: King Han spoke with him and was pleased. He had him ride in the chariot and oversee the various generals.
